00038 #ifndef INDEX_H
00039 #define INDEX_H
00040 
00041 #include <QStringList>

00046 #include <QFile>
00047 #include <QVector>
00048 
00049 class QTimer;
00050 
00051 QT_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00052 
00053 struct Document {
00054     Document( int d, int f ) : docNumber( d ), frequency( f ) {}
00055     Document() : docNumber( -1 ), frequency( 0 ) {}
00056     bool operator==( const Document &doc ) const {
00057         return docNumber == doc.docNumber;
00058     }
00059     bool operator<( const Document &doc ) const {
00060         return frequency > doc.frequency;
00061     }
00062     bool operator<=( const Document &doc ) const {
00063         return frequency >= doc.frequency;
00064     }
00065     bool operator>( const Document &doc ) const {
00066         return frequency < doc.frequency;
00067     }
00068     qint16 docNumber;
00069     qint16 frequency;
00070 };
00071 
00072 QDataStream &operator>>( QDataStream &s, Document &l );
00073 QDataStream &operator<<( QDataStream &s, const Document &l );
00074 
00075 class HelpIndex : public QObject
00076 {
00077     Q_OBJECT
00078 public:
00079     struct Entry {
00080             Entry( int d ) { documents.append( Document( d, 1 ) ); }
00081             Entry( QVector<Document> l ) : documents( l ) {}
00082             QVector<Document> documents;
00083     };
00084     struct PosEntry {
00085             PosEntry( int p ) { positions.append( p ); }
00086             QList<uint> positions;
00087     };
00088 
00089     HelpIndex( const QString &dp, const QString &hp );
00090     HelpIndex( const QStringList &dl, const QString &hp );

00092     void readDict();

00101     const QStringList& titlesList() { return titleList; };
